content.detailedDescription:
With no sound. i realized it was very low in the sky when i first noticed the bright ball at dusk. i really thought it was jupiter until my daughter said,"look daddy it's moving. 
we were bar-b q'n out back at dusk when what appeared to be the planet jupiter appeared. i remember before the sighting that the entire time i was outside i elt as if i was being watched. the sphere was very close above us when we later noticed. i yelled for my son to come out and see this amazing bright sphere and it started to move south faily fast and stopped, never making a sound. then it started to move out of the atmosphere at what seemed to be lightspeed then it was gone. my son only caught the last part of it as it disappeared. my daughter and i are left questioned and saying wow! this is not our first sighting.
content.summary: Bright ball, thought it was jupiter but then it started to move south and upward.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 8:20 pm january 29,2009 my wife and i were taking a walk with our daughter when my wife saw a bright white light appear in the sky out of nowhere from the northwest. the light was as bright as the evening star. we were walking near the corner of citrustree and santa gertrudes in east whittier. it then disappeared, but then reappeared very faint. it continued to travel at a high rate of speed getting larger as it came closer to us. the light traveled in a southeast direction, but change color from white to orange to red then back to white. each color lasting for for a few seconds. there were no trademark flashing lights like aircraft, and it was not in the typical flight pattern of this area.  we have lived here in whittier, ca our whole life right under the lax final approach pattern and it looked nothing like an aircraft. it was traveling much too fast to be an airplane or helicopter. there was no sound. after watching this for about 3 to 4 minutes the the fireball vanished into thin air. we continued to watch the area for another few minutes and nothing could be seen.
content.summary: Fast moving color changing fireball over whittier, ca.

content.detailedDescription: As i was heading home from my work in albany to just outside of moran where i live, approx 5 miles outside of moran i saw two red lights that i first thought looked like flares.  i could distinctly see it was two lights, then they disappeared and then reappeared approx 2-3 minutes later.  there were two red lights flashing on and off similar to a red light passing behind a picket fence.  they were traveling in an easterly direction, moving slowly and steadily with the lights flashing on and off while traveling in a slow steady straight movement.  i watched the lights trying to determine what they were and then approx 30 seconds to a minute later the two lights turned into a row of approx 15 non-blinking lights.  i only saw this row of lights for approx 2-3 seconds and then the lights disappeared.  i am not saying this was a space ship, it was just something i had never seen before.  we do have many military planes fly across our home often and we are located approx 50 miles from dyes airforce base in abiline, but i have never seen anything like this before and was unsure of where to report this sighting.  i wish i would have had my video camera with me but i did not so i have no pictures of what i witnessed.  if you do find out what these lights were, could you please contact me as it has really peaked my curiosity.
content.summary: I saw two alternating red lights that turned into a straight string on approx.15 red lights moving in the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: On 1/27/09 between 8:15pm. and 8:30pm. i took my dog outside.As i was facing the westerly direction ( i was standing in my driveway ) i noticed very bright lights coming towards me.I saw blinking lights on what i presumed were wings and instantly thought this was a plane althoug something about it did seem odd to me. this vehicle was very bright and the lights that were blinking on the wings were blue. i'm not completely certain, but i think the blue lights alternated with white lights. the vehicle flew directly over me and that's when i saw that the entire underside was divided into panels and every panel was lit up with very bright white light. in my head i was still thinking this was a plane but wondered what kind of plane has it's underside lit up like this one was. it was quite low, low enough for me to see the panel divisions. i heard noise something like a plane (not a helicopter) would make,but i was confused because of the altitude of this craft, i felt the noise should have been much louder. it was a plane-type noise but very muffled which put together with the lit up bottom, really caused me to question what i was seeing. this object moved at what i would call a cruising speed, not fast and not real slow. it maintained the same altitude the entire time it was in my field of vision from first seeing it coming from the west until it was out of sight in an eastern direction. it also remained abolutely brilliant (glowing) until it was out of my field of vision. this night was cloudy with no moon or stars visable at the the time i saw this. i saw no other aircraft in the sky at this time. the wind was not blowing.
content.summary: Looked up in sky and saw bright lights coming at me. thought it was a plane but entire underside was lit up in sections. noise was odd.

content.detailedDescription: I was stopped at a traffic light while driving.  i don't remember the exact time of day but it was daytime and there was plenty of light.  i looked up at the light and saw something in the sky above the tree line across the intersection.  it looked like a silver disc.  not big at all.  it was completely still in the sky and i had no idea what it was.  after 10 seconds or so, it slowly moved straight down and disappeared behind the tops of the trees.  after i saw the object i knew it wasn't something "normal" that you would find in the sky.  it wasn't far away either.  it was relatively close, like 1/4 mile away maybe....At the most.  i immediately called me sister and told her what i saw.
content.summary: Saw a hovering silver disc shape in the sky above the tree line in front of me.  moved straight down and i lost visibility behind the trees.

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from work and was suspicious of how bright this thing was in the sky and saw that it was still tried to take a pics with phone(new)and did not save pics my error. went home and ate dinner and my wife thinks that is am crazy now but left with a camera sony cyber shot 7.2mp and 4xs zoom and zommed in. the object seemed farther a way than earlier (video camera dead has better zoom). then i saw too objects, that did not look like stars to me and had no beacon lights. like what i saw years a go that i just came out about to you guys. it was cold and windy.
content.summary: Overcast when first seen very bright and could only see one thing.

content.detailedDescription:
I am sending a photo which a girl i raised as a daughter took late
last spring while she was visiting peru.

photo date: may 28th, 2008
machu picchu archeological site, peru
time was between 6:00 a.M. and 6:30 a.M.

http://www.Ufocasebook.Com/2009/machupicchu2008.Html

they had gone up there for the dawn when the photo was taken.
she was photographing the valley with the dawn light coming into
it across the mountain ranges. she was unaware of the object in
the photo until i pointed it out. she then e mailed it to me and i
blew it up in my irfanview and realized it did not look like a condor,
but was still too obscure to say it wasn't a black plane.

whatever it is, why is it inside or emitting a condensed cloud of some sort?

i would like to send it to jeff sainio to get his take on it, but do not have his e mail address. i would be grateful if you'd forward it to him.
in fact you can share it with mufon or anyone you think may benefit
from it.

since we don't know what the object is, as it could be a plane
or something else - a condor? we would like someone who can
"read" such a photo to take a look at it. i have attached to this e
mail the attachment she sent to me, as it is without the inset in it.

there is also some sort of rounded semi-visible shape directly
where the inset was placed by ufocasebook. it would look like a
classic saucer shape with a dark center. it looks like it could
be due to the terrain below in the valley or it is a ufo just
out of the visible spectrum which the camera also picked up.
i do not know if there is a way to analyse the photo for infrared.

please find the attached photo.
content.summary: Accidental photograph taken at machu picchu in which an unknown object appeared.

content.detailedDescription: For the past six months i have seen (3) lights  about 1000ft in the sky over the university of miami . they continue to move in circles around the university and i have even sat in my car and watched them move to let airplanes go by. i know that the lights are not planes, they move in circles. i have seen them many times and i always know they are around when i see helicopters in the area. please if anyone lives in miami take a look and you will see.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 lights over university of miami.

content.detailedDescription: I just saw this about 15 minutes ago at first 2 orange lights appeared and as quickly as they appeared they dissapeared ..Then it came back about 2 minutes later as 1 orange light ..Then a few minutes later it came back as a row of about 5-7 lights and it came on in a sequence ..It was orange and as it was very bright ..Wow im still shaking ..This was just an awesome sight ..Someone else had of seen this in the area ..It was huge when it came back the 3rd time ..I'll edit this later ..When i can think better ..Also i grabbed my camera but it dissapeared to quickly for me to snap a picture ..
content.summary: 2 lights then 1 light then about 5-7 lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I'm not too sure if what i saw were actually ufo's, but i figured i'd get a record down reqardless, just in case someone else happened to see what i saw. 

i was returning home from school around 5pm, got out of the 157th street subway on broadway, was looking south straight down broadway and ahead of me saw what resembled most closely to a rocket spewing its fiery exhust as it climbed into the atmosphere. the spew was conical at the top and seemed to have two parallel trails that were very long in relation to the object that was doing the spewing. i figrued at first it might be a plane releasing its exhaust. however, those are usually white and have thin trail lines that dissapear gradually as the plane moves. this did not. it had a firery yellow and red spewing color, had very thick trails, and the object did not seem to climb very fast into the atmosphere, it climbed very slowly. also a plane happened to pass my view in front of the ufo, and from that perspective could see the ufo was very much further into the distance and was much larger then a plane. after only 2 min of watching this object, the spew almost immediately all dissapeared into the atmosphere, then reapeared at about half the original volume, then almost immediately quickly vansihed into the atmosphere, at that point whatever was spewing exhaust into the atmosphere was beyond my view. this is puzzling to me because, usually exhaust dissipates into the atmosphere gradiently from the trailing end first. the spew from this object dissintigrated all together and left no residue. 

also to my south western view from that location, close to the crescent moon i was seeing the setting light blue sky was a small glowing object that almost looked like a star. which i alos found puzzling considering, 1 it's nyc, we dont see stars here, 2 it was not dark out yet, the sky was still blue, 3 it was the only non-moviwing glowing body in the sky. also it was not completely white in color like a normal star would appear, rather it had a bluish overtone around it. it was not moving at all, and stayed visible, yet at the time just figured it was a celestial body i didn't happen to know was visible to the naked eye that day. or maybee it was actually a ufo. i dont know, but at least it's on paper now. thanks for reading.

greg
content.summary: Two ufo's over new york city at rush hour.

content.detailedDescription: I was dropping off some material,at 310 a1a,and noticed and object hovering above the ocean. the object was less than a quarter mile out,and about one hundred feet in the air. it was round,black,and about the size of a suv. when i first saw it i thought,this cant be happining again. but it sure was. i continued unloading the truck,and checking to see if it was still there,and it was. the object was barely moving at all,and it was pretty windy,on the ocean. i went across the street to point out this object,to some people who were walking down a1a. they figured it was a kite or a ballon,tied to a boat that was out there. so i didnt want to persist, it was anything other than what they were claiming it to be.So i went back across the street,and continued working. the object continued to crawl north east,against a twenty plus western wind. so i figured id call 911,and get a police officer,to take a look at it. i called it in,and they said theyd send someone right out. it took about a half hour for a delray beach police officer to arrive. when he did i asked him if he had binoculars,as i requested from the dispather. he didnt have binoculars,but he could see the object. he speculated it could be a kite our ballon tied to a boat that was out there. i pointed out to him that it was north east of the boat,and we had a pretty strong western wind. he agreed,it must not be either of those objects. he radioed,to the life guard towers, to take a look with thier binoculars. any one with binoculars wouldve got a really good look at the object. so he got in his car,to head north, to speak with the lifeguards, about what they could see. i was at this location for another half hour or so as the object,went out of sight. i went about my day wishing a brought my binoculars with me.
content.summary: 4) i was across the street from the ocean and noticed a black round object hovering.

content.detailedDescription: I dropped a friend off from work,and was driving down the street. i noticed an object in the sky,about a quarter mile away,and about one hundred feet in the air. the object was very shiney,it looked like it was chrome,and the sun was reflecting off it. at first i was very surprized. then i figured it must have been an airplane. the object appeared to start turning,and i figured it mus be a plane. the object was getting narrow, as if it was turning away from me,then it disappeared. i was completly dumbfounded. i pulled over looking at a clear sky,trying to figure out where it could have went.
content.summary: 2) it was a round very shiny object it looked like chrome.

content.detailedDescription: I was working on a house, in deerfield beach. i was at the same location three days prior,and saw two ufos.This time,i brought a pair of binoculars,and a spotting scope with me.I was only on the job five minutes,and was looking out to the ocean. i saw an oval shaped,black object shoot out of the ocean,on a radius,and go back into the ocean. it must have been about a half mile out,and went fifty to one hundred feet in the air. after i saw the object,i was pretty scared. i didnt even want to turn my back to the ocean,to work. i did turn my back to the ocean,and start to get organized to start to work. i turned my back for about thirty seconds. when i turned back around,i saw a rainbow. knowing the biblical meaning of a rainbow,i was instantly calm. so i went ahead and finished my work. before i left i set up the spotting scope,and looked through it for about three minutes. i didnt see any other objects. i packed up my tools and went back to the shop for the day.
content.summary: 3 it was a black oval shaped object about fifty feet long.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work taking break outside with a coworker. we were just sitting there and i happened to see two objets coming over a small building. i asked my friend what he thought they were. at first they appeared to be small clouds. but they were low. definitely under control. he said they had to be some kind of ufo. so, we ran down to the parking lot and got binoculars out of my car. looking through the binoculars they appeared to be clusters of light. not bright lights. no flashing. no noise. just dim light. my friend ran in and got the other guys to come out and take a look. we took turns looking through the binoculars and all saw the same thing. the objects stopped over the main parking lot then moved over the building where we work and appeared to get much smaller. as if they were going straight up. they got so small that they blended in with the stars. they then went back the way they came. we lost sight of them as they went far enought where we couldn't see them anymore. my feelings at the time were excitement. i have never seen any kind of ufo before. i've listened to coast to coast am for years and heard all the stories and was glad to see something myself. there were 5 of us that saw it and can't explain it.
content.summary: 2 objects at first appeared to be clouds. moved side by side.  appeared to go up high and back from the direction they came.

content.detailedDescription: I was doing repairs on a house,in deerfield beach. the house was located on a private beach,directly off the ocean. i was working on the eastern side of the house, about twenty yards away from the ocean.I was only on the job site approximitly fifteen minutes. i noticed two objects in the sky,apx. one mile out into the ocean. the objects were about two hundred feet in the air. when i first saw the objects,i had no idea what they could be.They were black spherical objects.They must have been at least one hundred feet in diameter. the objects were stationary,in fifteen to twenty five mile an hour, western winds. the objects appeared to be,about fifty feet apart.The southern most object was about,twenty five feet higher, than the object to my left of it. after seing these ufos for about fifteen minutes, i noticed a man walking through the back yard. he was there working,as i was. i pointed out the objects to him,he could only see the lower object to our right,as the other object was coverd by clouds. he was also shocked,as to what it could be. i told him there was a second object, slightly visible to the right,but he couldnt see it. i told him i was aware of thier presence now,for about half an hour. he said, hed never seen anything like it before,and had no idea what it could be. he was only in the backyard,for about fifteen minutes,fixing a sprinkler head,and he left. then i decided to call my dad,and tell him what i was seing. he was jealous,wishing he was there to see them as well. as i was describing the situation to him, the object on the left started to move. the object was moving in a circular motion,as well as side to side,and up and down. i got really excited,seing the acrobatics of this mysterious,unworldly object. the object didnt move very far,but it was obviously putting on a show. me and my father, briefly continued to speculate about the origin of this object,and then he had to get back to his prior engagments. shortly after our phone conversation, the object returned to its stationary position,as i returned to my duties. about twenty minutes later, i recieved a call from a coworker. as i proceded to tell him about the highlight of my day,the object again began to move around,in the same fashion. we were both excited. he told me i should alert the coast guard. i told him i didnt have the coast guard, on speed dial,so he suggested i call 911. i did call 911,i wasnt sure how theyd respond. as i was telling the dispatcher about the objects,the object on the left,started moving again... i was telling her my location,and that theyd been there for about an hour and a half now. she said she would dispatch someone to the area,to take a look. about a minute after i got off the phone with her, the object on the left dropped into the ocean. it didnt seem to be moving any faster,than if it was free falling. at this time the object on the right was no longer in sight. i was looking around to see if i could see anything,and i couldnt see a thing. about thirty seconds later,i noticed to objects much further away,from where the two objects were. they crossed paths a couple times,and vanished. i was thinking, maybe they were our fighter jets, coming in to see what the objects were,then they vanished. now i think, they were infact the same objects, and for what ever reason they were getting out of dodge. so now iam looking around, not seing anything at all. so i went ahead to continue working,which hadnt been very efficent so far. as i was starting to pack up my tools for the day,i noticed the objects were back in the same formation. they were further north,and motionless. at this time,i didnt want to leave but,i had to get back to the shop. they were there as i lefted,and i also noticed them on a1a,as i was leaving.That was my experience on january ninth 09...
content.summary: 1) i noticed objects in the sky, over the ocean.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home and i just happened to look out the window and i saw a rocket/missile shaped object with a blue light attached to the back of it falling from the sky about 200 yards away from me in a nearby field. my first reaction was that it couldn't have been a blimp, as it was going too fast to be that. my friend and i both saw it, he started having an anxiety attack and called the local police about it. i lost sight of the ufo once it left the horizon line on land. it seemed to be crash landing though.
content.summary: Blueish  green flashing light coming from it. looked like it was crash landing.

content.detailedDescription: Arwebsf fxdcv
content.summary: Arvsd

content.detailedDescription:
My father's acquantance from a u.S. air force squadron in the same group as my dad's ( i believe it was the 32th troop carrier squadron ) sent him a short dvd ( converted from 8mm movie footage ) shot in 1957 of a flight of c-119 cargo planes in formation.

the camera is pointing out the port side of one plane at two other planes. as a non c-119 is framed ( two separate shots in the same sequence ) an oval object (which is at all times changing it's relative position in a smooth way which seems to indicate it is flying and maneuvering with the plane ) appears first to the lower right of the frame and subsequently moves to positions in front of, below and above the cockpit of the framed plane.

the object seems illuminated by the same light and shadow as the planes and none of its movements suggest that it is connected to the interior of the camera or host plane.

i believe the original movie footage is available for analysis but will need to get permission from owner.

i have read extensively about ufos and recognized the unique nature of this footage as soon as it was viewed.

at first i believed that a plane out of the frame was trailing some sort of objects by a wire ( for measurements of some kind ) but i think the objects movements appear to be too "adaptive" and less haphazard than they would be simply trailing the plane.

there may be reflections that establish the scale of the object which is my main purpose in submitting this report. it appears to me that the object is positioned at the same distance from the camera that the non c-119 plane is... which would make it almost the diameter of the framed planes fuselage.

i have attached a graphic made from sequential frames from this film (going from left to right ) please let me know of you would like to examine the film footage.

thanks, {pid}
content.summary: Round or egg shaped object flying with and around front of plane making several approaches to it.

content.detailedDescription:
Looking south from my house not as high as jets a light just came on then headed north but way up in the stars. another one or same headed south east then west.. while looking at that one ..This off colored light of a star was swaying back and forth sun came up and its  still there. i called and left a massage but left wrong date...Everything started when i got home at 605 am something told me to look south and after a few moments thats when i saw a light appear it was lower than the jets flying over725 now and light is still there..Please call me {pid} this is like the fourth time ive seen these lights in a month i woke my kids and showed them...They thought it was cool.But not if they come down and get us..Jan 29 09 at 6:05 am... feeling was strange to me this time compare when i saw tha last lights i felt good..



{cms/jat/pid} text moved to narrative
content.summary: 3 ufos 1 over my house others went by north, south east,and west.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home south when i saw a bright flash of light outside of my left window. i looked left and up towards the sky and noticed that the sky was brighter than before. it was similar to a flash of lightning but more subdued; not quite as white more blueish. i then caught a glimpse of something in my peripheral vision and looked further to the left. i saw what i think was a solid blue ball that then seperated into two pieces. one piece was smaller that went down. the other piece was bigger and went up. both where blue in color and spread apart like a wishbone on its side. i don't remember hearing any explosions though i did have the radio on. this lasted only a few seconds and then they either disappeared or travelled out of my line of sight. i think they where just above the treeline but it was dark and i can't actually remember if that part of road had any trees. the vehicle i was in was travelling around 45-55 mph. i thought at the time it was strange and could possibly be a meteor or something but afterwards that it could have been fireworks. i only saw those objects once, however and did not notice any more flashes of light that night.
content.summary: Bright flash of light with blue fireballs.

content.altitude: Treetop, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
As i went outside and wanted to try out my digital camera...For just the reason of picking out infrared light / i'm into robots/electronics  "for infrared light shows up on digital film."i figured i would try it with ufo's and "bingo!!!" i've got ufo's for every time of the month.Like a landing strip around here!!!I looked straight up in the neighbors yard.And took the picture...I couldn't see anything there; but i could sense something or someone watching me?...I got great pics and can read the hyroglifs (symbols)on the bottom of the ship, above me about 30-40 ft. up over top of the tree above me...Later the object looked like a star, but more twinkly soto speak.I'm the guy with the film of a wormhole opening up and closing in the same frame..If i hadn't set my camera for 6500 exposure on my film..I wouldn't have got it.Check the pictures out!!!I also have pics of ufo in the distance (500 ft. or higher)on the 3rd of december when i had to buy another camera..Bluescreen error..Malfunction..It was also in the area close to the moon in the other pic of the same photo.I work for olan mills photography...These photo's haven't been doctored up in any way!!What u see is what u get..
                i say grab a cheap digital...You wont regret it!!!Keep looking into the skies!!!...........
                                         " *  *  *"
                                             "*"
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: A sphere "o" with a light ring around the edges-underside of the ship/hyrogliffs on underside of ship visible and signs of communication with me??/  pics also of a 4 sphered ufo all moving together as one ship.Twinkling as no others.

content.detailedDescription: I was just at a conference in anchorage with my paranormal investigation team's booth.  i was told that there have been a slew of sightings of glowing discs in the mat-su valley, seen by folks in anchorage and wasilla.  the same sort of objects have been seen recently in fairbanks and north pole (in the interior).  we had three pictures from the newsminer's webcam (ufo sightings found on mufon) of an old ufo caught on film.  many people said that the glowing discs look exactly as the glowing disc from the newsminer's photos look.

On wednesday, january 28, 2009 at 7:10am i witnessed a greenish light in the western part of the dallas skyline that flickered and pulsed for about 6 seconds it was the color of a palish neon green. i noticed this light and pointed it out to my co-worker and asked him "what the hell is that?", he looked and said, "i don't know".  i said the color looks to be similar to that of an exploding transformer, my co-worker stated that's too big to be a transformer.  it took up a very large portion of the western sky.  after several minutes a service vehicle arrived at the dock.  i asked him (service man) if he saw anything weird in the sky and he responded ,"you mean that light?" i said, "yea", where were you at when you saw it?", he said, "i was coming north bound i35 approaching the commerce street exit and saw it to my left."  this would place the occurance totally out of the down town area where i observed the light.  i googled for any logically explanation as to what this was, i did not find anything, i had not heard it in the news either.  this may be nothing but i have never seen anything like this in my life to that scale.  it reseambled a sort-of... aurora borealis, as seen on tv, but it was smaller than the entire sky. i know you are probably busy with all kinds of reports and things, but i would appreciate a call if you find out anything. i'd like to know what it was. 

thanks,
joe
content.summary: Green light in west part of dallas skyline flickering, pulsing lasting about 6 sec.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello, my name is santos and i would like to share a sighting i happen to witness.
i was driving on my way to work on the morning of tuesday january 27, 2009. i was driving southbound on route 93 around the border of new hampshire and massachusetts.
it was still a bit dark with a bit of a sunrise. when driving this morning, i notice, what i thought was an airplane just beneath the clouds. what captured my attention was that the aircraft appear to be falling from the sky. i said to myself " my god! an airplane is falling!" the problem here was the object dropped vertically with control, defying gravity. this is when it was clear to me to be a ufo. this object then climbed back up vertically, then traveled up in a 45 angle and flew out of the sky at a enormous rate of speed. at this point i asked myself. "what did i just see?" for me there is no other explanation.....I witnessed a ufo! the object was a bright round glowing circle and was floating in the sky like a balloon (kinda like a light bulb in the sky). i was thrown back by the technology, this was not from this planet. i wasn't afraid, if anything i was amazed and impressed. i really hope to see this again someday. i don't have any videos or pics , the event lasted for about 7-10 seconds. 

if you have any questions you would like to ask, please feel free. 

thanks.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo sighting....

content.detailedDescription:
At approx. 10:20 this evening (friday jan, 16th 2009) i saw two bright blue
lights in the sky. what makes it unique is that it was very bright and
considerably large. it was the color of a street light and i saw it through
my window curtains that are almost opaque. i live close to the polk parkway in auburndale and at the time i was facing north so if it was something like
a meteorite it would be in the vicinity of polk city.
content.summary: Blue lights.

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside of my house and walked to my car to get my ciggarettes out i stuck half of my body in the car as i reached to get the ciggarettes i looked out of the front windshield and saw the sun was glaring off an object in the sky so i took a better look at it and it seemed like a cigar shaped object gliding in sky i took yet a better look at it and it did not have winds or nothing in common to any aircraft i have seen around here it also seemed to have an ora around it looked like smoke and it made no noise threw the sky of any engines on the aircraft an all aircrafts that pass threw here need to be heard because they echo loudly threw the mountains when they pass threw there and it was silent today
content.summary: Weird, confusing.

content.detailedDescription:
I was backpacking with a group of high schoolers in the yosemite backcountry during the first week of july, 1987. i was a chaperone. we hiked from tuolomne meadows up to young lakes and made camp at the first lake at approximately 3756'16.47" n 11920'51.91" w (view photo on google earth). at sometime around 10pm the students and the other chaperones were doing a group massage exercise. i had a slight case of altitude sickness and was away from the group lying on my back looking east at the sky. 

about a half hour later, along the ridge of the mountains, a very bright white light appeared from behind and slightly to the right of a peak on the ridge (see aforementioned google photo at the leftmost peak near the trees). it was too large and too bright to be a star. at first, i thought it was an aircraft. but there was no sound and only the single lightno running lights. it was also too big to be a spotlight from a helicopter. as i recall, it appeared to be roughly the size of a pea at arms length from my perspective.

it rose slowly at first, but as it ascended it picked up speed until it seemed to accelerate exponentially. it had a vertical trajectory. it continued to rise until it was as faint as a dim star, and then, quickly vanished.

the event happened so fast and i was so transfixed, i was unable to tell anyone while it was happening. also, the group was too far away and the exercise in which they were engaged required silence. none of them were looking up due to the nature of the exercise. and, of course, when i explained what i had witnessed to them about an hour later, i was met with disbelief. 

the next day, we hiked back down to tuolomne meadows village. i was among the first of the group to arrive and was hanging out in front of the store when one of the students i told the night before came rushing over to me. she had met a group of hikers along the trail who were camping on the opposite side of the ridge nearly due east from our camp site. she was the first person they ran into on the trail; and immediately upon meeting her they said, "you won't believe what we saw last night!" she introduced us and we shared notes.

their story was much more remarkable than mine. they had been camping next to the lake that feeds delaney creek (3755'54.85" n 11918'18.13" w) the night before. they built a makeshift sweat lodge from fallen branches during the day and were enjoying their creation that evening when suddenly, they noticed a bright light coming from the direction of the lake beaming through the holes of their lodge.

from what i can recall from what they told me: when they peered out of the entrance of the sweat lodge, they saw a large spherical object that was hovering above the surface of the lake. they told me all they could see was bright light. they said it made no sound. then, a beam of light from the object scanned their camp site and soon pointed directly at them. they retreated back into the lodge until the beam went away. after that, they peeked out at the object and said it began to rise vertically and the rest of their description matched mine exactly save the fact that it was from the other side of the ridge.
content.summary: Sighting in the yosemite backcountry in 7/87

content.detailedDescription: We recorded the ingural address from the c.B.S. station and when president bush leaves the capital there is an object in the sky behind him. then the camera switches shots and a few secounds right before he goes behind a sigh a black streak flys behind the helicopter. when you pause it and go frame by frame it is a solid object, black and pointed a few secounds later it dissapears. the whole time katie couric is taling along with a male reporter
content.summary: Black cigar shape flew behind president bush's helicopter.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to my mother's house when i noticed an incredibly bright "star" that was moving directly over the direction of her neighborhood. at first i thought it was a plane or helicopter but soon realized it was moving way to slow for it to be as close as it appeared.  my mother's neighborhood is near an airport so it is common to see tons of airplanes everyday. this was different. when i got to my mother's house i ran in and grabbed my sister. we rushed outside with our cameras and got into my car to follow the slow moving craft. before we left the neighborhood we took a picture over a neighbors house. it was moving furthur west so we drove to the road that is the least lit by street lights so that we could get a better look at the object. we followed the object for about 30mins. we pulled into a county park where we took a few other pictures. the camera's are not super so the pictures are not amazing. the camera we used was a kodak easy share c513. when we took the pictures we noticed that the bright object was actually multicolored, flashing many different colors of lights however, to the naked eye you could not tell. i think it is because the flashing is happening so quickly in the night sky that we only grasp that there is light and see white (my theory only lol). well anyway as we are taking pictures the object begins to move back towards town, knoxville, and as it gets closer the few small street lights begin turning off one pair at a time. there was no sound to the object and it hovered in the same "level" in the sky, below the clouds. we got a bit spooked out and decided to drive home. you could still see the object in the back window as we drove home and then suddenly it dissapered, like it had never been there.
content.summary: Extremely bright and slow moving.  it was stark white and blinding.

content.detailedDescription:
Ok, these are not my stories . . . they are ones i have been hearing of my whole life.
the first is the ufo siting:  my parents moved back to atkinson from omaha in about 1964 and owned a cafe on the corner of highways 20 and 11.
one afternoon or early evening, my dad's cousin, and his friends from the baseball team came running into the cafe all excited.  they had all just watched a ufo come down over the baseball field and hoverd there!  don't know how long, just that it happened and apparently a lot of people saw it. 

the next one is also about a siting and a possible abduction.  please keep in mind that i don't know the whole story, only what i remember hearing:  there is a family north of town who had a ufo land in their back yard or field behind their house.  they watched it land out their window.  there was talk of their electricity bill being way larger than normal the next billing and they think the ufo was using their power.  the rest is that the mother had a severe emmotional break down after this and would not talk about it.  there is a possability that either she, or one of the other family members was taken and it upset her greatly (as it would me!).  i surmise that she may have watched it happen and was powerless to stop it?

the third event was my father's personal experience:  while working for a friend of his, on their cattle ranch or feed yard, they came upon a mutilated cow while out checking fences or cattle one day.  my dad said it was the most prescise surgery he had ever seen, and no blood.

the last event was told to me personally by our church youth groups' teacher during a hay-rack ride one evening:  my teacher and her, then husband, were coming from an event in town and happened upon a black helicopter taking off from one of their pastures.  it stopped and hovered, he stopped the pickup and was going to get out his rifle and shoot at them.  she said not to because they could obviously see them as well and they didn't know what kind of "power" they had.  so, they waited and the helicopter finally left.  this last weekend i talked to her about it and she said that it flew over them and shone a spotlight on the pickup.  she also said there had been many mutilated cows on their land during that time.

my parents tell me that there have been numerous mutilated cattle, and one horse, events in our area, with some black helicopters involved in some of them.  my uncle also knows of a man who apparently caught someone in the act and they rolled him up in barbed wire and told him that if he told anyone who they were they would kill him and his family.  so, my guess is that these are some sick people from our area who are involved in some scarry stuff! 

please give this case to mr. richard webb of omaha, ne.
thank you!
content.summary: Ufo hovered over baseball field in atkinson while a game was in progress.
